https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/87tmBJac7Rl4EpCkURXkxqL7x2d.jpg A loner fresh out of rehab and hunted by both sides of the law returns home to solve the murder of his sister, and finds himself entangled in a game of revenge on the LA club circuit. 48 Hours to Live
